name: Demi
short_description:
Sorry, below a google translate.

In their spare time, created a model of the world stage " of inanimate nature ." There is land ( surface) , there -moving star, has minerals, due to diffusion of the scattered over the surface with varying degrees of volatility.

The next stage - the first simulation ( oldest ) microorganisms , so they started to stock organic matter. And then the modeling of higher organisms.

The program has an outlook only as a distributed network application project like SETI @ home. This interest in other people can be in the competitive effect - to player created organism ( species, genus , family ) survived and became dominant on the planet.

A large number of participants will great variety of wildlife models and computing resources for its calculation .
summary: Game - modeling of animate and inanimate nature. In Russian.
